Begin helsethScript

short nolore
short kingMove
short OnPCHitMe
short doOnce
short FightDay

if ( GetJournalIndex TR_Bamz < 50 )
	If ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex TR_Bamz >= 50 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		Enable
	endif
endif


if ( GetJournalIndex TR_Champion >= 70 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex TR_Champion < 80 )
		if ( karrodFightStart == 3 )
			if ( doOnce == 0 )
				;during duel, pacify king
				set doOnce to -1
				setalarm 0
				setfight 0
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( OnPCHitMe == 1 )
	if ( GetHealth < 400 )
		set kingHit to 1
		StartCombat Player
	endif
	set OnPCHitMe to 0
endif





End helsethScript
